comment:
Extracted Variables:
- \( x \): Number of pill vaccines administered
- \( y \): Number of shot vaccines administered

Definitions:
- \( x \geq 30 \): The clinic must administer at least 30 pill vaccines.
- \( y \geq 3x \): The clinic must deliver at least 3 times as many shots as pills.
- \( 10x + 20y \leq 10000 \): The total time taken to administer the vaccines must not exceed 10000 minutes.
- Maximize: \( x + y \) to maximize the number of patients vaccinated.
